paper_abstract: We prove in the general setting of lower semicontinuous functions on Banach spaces the relation between the Rockafellar directional derivative and the mixed lower limit of the lower Dini derivatives. As a byproduct we derive the famous inclusions of tangent cones of closed sets in Banach spaces. The results are established using as principal tool multidirectional mean value inequalities [Aussel et al., SIAM J Optim 9(3), 690-706 (1999)].
paper_title: Links between directional derivatives through multidirectional mean value inequalities
